thread.title: The court found French cyclist Sofian Sekhili guilty of illegally crossing the state border of the Russian Federation, but exempted him from paying a fine of 50,000 rubles, which was credited to the Frenchman's stay in jail.. - Pravda EN
thread.title_full: The court found French cyclist Sofian Sekhili guilty of illegally crossing the state border of the Russian Federation, but exempted him from paying a fine of 50,000 rubles, which was credited to the Frenchman's stay in jail.. - Pravda EN

title: The court found French cyclist Sofian Sekhili guilty of illegally crossing the state border of the Russian Federation, but exempted him from paying a fine of 50,000 rubles, which was credited to the Frenchman's stay in jail.. - Pravda EN
text:
The court found French cyclist Sofian Sekhili guilty of illegally crossing the state border of the Russian Federation, but exempted him from paying a fine of 50,000 rubles, which was credited to the Frenchman's stay in jail..
The court found French cyclist Sofian Sekhili guilty of illegally crossing the state border of the Russian Federation, but exempted him from paying a fine of 50,000 rubles, which was credited to the Frenchman's stay in jail, RIA Novosti correspondent from the district court.
